class pseudo_hoop_algebra = left_complemented_monoid_algebra + right_complemented_monoid_nole_algebra +
  assumes left_right_impl_times: "(a l\<rightarrow> b) * a = a * (a r\<rightarrow> b)"
begin

definition 
    "inf_rr a b  = a * (a r\<rightarrow> b)"

definition
    "lesseq_r a b = (a r\<rightarrow> b = 1)"

definition
    "less_r a b = (lesseq_r a b \<and> \<not> lesseq_r b a)"
end
context pseudo_hoop_algebra begin
lemma right_complemented_monoid_algebra: "class.right_complemented_monoid_algebra lesseq_r less_r 1 (*) inf_rr (r\<rightarrow>)"

     inf_rr (r\<rightarrow>)

     inf_rr (r\<rightarrow>)

 1. \<And>a b. less_r a b = (lesseq_r a b \<and> \<not> lesseq_r b a)
 2. \<And>a b. inf_rr a b = a * (a r\<rightarrow> b)
 3. \<And>a. a r\<rightarrow> a = (1::'a)
 4. \<And>a b. a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)
 5. \<And>a b c.
       a * b r\<rightarrow> c = b r\<rightarrow> a r\<rightarrow> c
 6. \<And>a b. lesseq_r a b = (a r\<rightarrow> b = (1::'a))
apply simp_all

proof (prove)

 3. \<And>a b. a * (a r\<rightarrow> b) = b * (b r\<rightarrow> a)
 4. \<And>a b c.
       a * b r\<rightarrow> c = b r\<rightarrow> a r\<rightarrow> c
 5. \<And>a b. lesseq_r a b = (a r\<rightarrow> b = (1::'a))
apply (simp add: less_r_def)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b. inf_rr a b = a * (a r\<rightarrow> b)

 3. \<And>a b c.
       a * b r\<rightarrow> c = b r\<rightarrow> a r\<rightarrow> c
 4. \<And>a b. lesseq_r a b = (a r\<rightarrow> b = (1::'a))

apply (rule right_impl_times, rule right_impl_ded)

goal (1 subgoal):

    (\<forall>x xa. x l\<rightarrow> xa = x r\<rightarrow> xa)
apply safe

definition
  "lower_bound A = {a . \<forall> x \<in> A . a \<le> x}"

definition
  "infimum A = {a \<in> lower_bound A . (\<forall> x \<in> lower_bound A . x \<le> a)}"
lemma infimum_unique: "(infimum A = {x}) = (x \<in> infimum A)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (infimum A = {x}) = (x \<in> infimum A)
apply safe

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. infimum A = {x} \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> infimum A
 2. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> infimum A; xa \<in> infimum A;
        xa \<notin> {}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xa = x
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> infimum A; xa \<in> infimum A;
        xa \<notin> {}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xa = x
apply (rule antisym)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> infimum A; xa \<in> infimum A;
        xa \<notin> {}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> xa \<le> x
 2. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>x \<in> infimum A; xa \<in> infimum A;
        xa \<notin> {}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> xa
by (simp_all add: infimum_def)

lemma infimum_pair: "a \<in> infimum {x . x = b \<or> x = c} = (a = b \<sqinter> c)"

proof (prove)

         (x = b \<longrightarrow> a \<le> b) \<and>
         (x = c \<longrightarrow> a \<le> c)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x.
         (\<forall>xa.
             (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
             (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)) \<longrightarrow>
         x \<le> a)) =
    (a = b \<sqinter> c)
apply safe

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                (x = b \<longrightarrow> a \<le> b) \<and>
                (x = c \<longrightarrow> a \<le> c);
     \<forall>x.
        (\<forall>xa.
            (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
            (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)) \<longrightarrow>
        x \<le> a\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a = b \<sqinter> c
 2. \<And>x. a = b \<sqinter> c \<Longrightarrow> b \<sqinter> c \<le> b
 3. \<And>x. a = b \<sqinter> c \<Longrightarrow> b \<sqinter> c \<le> c
 4. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a = b \<sqinter> c;
        \<forall>xa.
           (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
           (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> b \<sqinter> c
apply (rule antisym)

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.

                (x = c \<longrightarrow> a \<le> c);
     \<forall>x.
        (\<forall>xa.
            (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
            (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)) \<longrightarrow>
        x \<le> a\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a \<le> b \<sqinter> c
 2. \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                (x = b \<longrightarrow> a \<le> b) \<and>
                (x = c \<longrightarrow> a \<le> c);
     \<forall>x.
        (\<forall>xa.
            (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
            (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)) \<longrightarrow>
        x \<le> a\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> b \<sqinter> c \<le> a
 3. \<And>x. a = b \<sqinter> c \<Longrightarrow> b \<sqinter> c \<le> b
 4. \<And>x. a = b \<sqinter> c \<Longrightarrow> b \<sqinter> c \<le> c
 5. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a = b \<sqinter> c;
        \<forall>xa.
           (xa = b \<longrightarrow> x \<le> b) \<and>
           (xa = c \<longrightarrow> x \<le> c)\<rbrakk>

     (l\<rightarrow>) a ` {x. x = b \<or> x = c} \<noteq>

definition
  "upper_bound A = {a . \<forall> x \<in> A . x \<le> a}"

definition
  "supremum A = {a \<in> upper_bound A . (\<forall> x \<in> upper_bound A . a \<le> x)}"

     (\<forall>x\<in>A. x \<le> b) \<and>
     (\<forall>x.
         (\<forall>xa\<in>A. xa \<le> x) \<longrightarrow>
         b \<le> x)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a = b

lemma power_set_Suc2:
  "A *^ (Suc n) = A *^ n ** A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A *^ Suc n = A *^ n ** A
apply (induct_tac n)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. A *^ Suc 0 = A *^ 0 ** A
 2. \<And>n.
       A *^ Suc n = A *^ n ** A \<Longrightarrow>
       A *^ Suc (Suc n) = A *^ Suc n ** A
apply (simp add: times_set_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       A *^ Suc n = A *^ n ** A \<Longrightarrow>
       A *^ Suc (Suc n) = A *^ Suc n ** A
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       A ** A *^ n = A *^ n ** A \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** (A *^ n ** A) = A *^ n ** A ** A
apply (subst times_set_assoc)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       A ** A *^ n = A *^ n ** A \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** A *^ n ** A = A *^ n ** A ** A
by simp

lemma power_set_add:
  "A *^ (n + m) = (A *^ n) ** (A *^ m)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A *^ (n + m) = A *^ n ** A *^ m
apply (induct_tac m)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. A *^ (n + 0) = A *^ n ** A *^ 0
 2. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A *^ (n + Suc na) = A *^ n ** A *^ Suc na
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. A *^ n = A *^ n ** {1::'a}
 2. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A *^ (n + Suc na) = A *^ n ** A *^ Suc na
apply (simp add: times_set_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A *^ (n + Suc na) = A *^ n ** A *^ Suc na
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** (A *^ n ** A *^ na) = A *^ n ** (A ** A *^ na)
apply (subst times_set_assoc)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** A *^ n ** A *^ na = A *^ n ** (A ** A *^ na)
apply (subst times_set_assoc)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** A *^ n ** A *^ na = A *^ n ** A ** A *^ na
apply (subst power_set_Suc2 [THEN sym])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>na.
       A *^ (n + na) = A *^ n ** A *^ na \<Longrightarrow>
       A ** A *^ n ** A *^ na = A *^ Suc n ** A *^ na
by simp

lemma sup_union:
  "a \<in> supremum A \<Longrightarrow> b \<in> supremum B \<Longrightarrow> supremum {a, b} = supremum (A \<union> B)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>a \<in> supremum A; b \<in> supremum B\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> supremum {a, b} = supremum (A \<union> B)
apply safe
apply (simp_all add: supremum_def upper_bound_def)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>(\<forall>x\<in>A. x \<le> a) \<and>
                (\<forall>x.
                    (\<forall>xa\<in>A. xa \<le> x) \<longrightarrow>
                    a \<le> x);
        (\<forall>x\<in>B. x \<le> b) \<and>
        (\<forall>x.
            (\<forall>xa\<in>B. xa \<le> x) \<longrightarrow> b \<le> x);
        a \<le> x \<and>
        b \<le> x \<and>
        (\<forall>xa.
            a \<le> xa \<and> b \<le> xa \<longrightarrow>
            x \<le> xa)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>xa\<in>A \<union> B. xa \<le> x
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>(\<forall>x\<in>A. x \<le> a) \<and>
                (\<forall>x.
                    (\<forall>xa\<in>A. xa \<le> x) \<longrightarrow>
                    a \<le> x);
        (\<forall>x\<in>B. x \<le> b) \<and>
        (\<forall>x.
            (\<forall>xa\<in>B. xa \<le> x) \<longrightarrow> b \<le> x);
        (\<forall>xa\<in>A \<union> B. xa \<le> x) \<and>
        (\<forall>xa.
            (\<forall>x\<in>A \<union> B. x \<le> xa) \<longrightarrow>
            x \<le> xa)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>xa.
                            a \<le> xa \<and> b \<le> xa \<longrightarrow>
                            x \<le> xa
apply safe
apply auto
apply (subgoal_tac "(\<forall>x \<in> A \<union> B. x \<le> xa)")
by auto

         b \<le> x)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>x\<in>A \<union> B. x \<le> b

lemma [simp]: "m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n \<le> a ^ m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n \<le> a ^ m
apply (subgoal_tac "a ^ n = (a ^ m) * (a ^ (n-m))")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>m \<le> n; a ^ n = a ^ m * a ^ (n - m)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n \<le> a ^ m
 2. m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n = a ^ m * a ^ (n - m)
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n = a ^ m * a ^ (n - m)
apply (cut_tac a = a and m = "m" and n = "n - m" in power_add)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>m \<le> n; a ^ (m + (n - m)) = a ^ m * a ^ (n - m)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n = a ^ m * a ^ (n - m)
by simp
lemma [simp]: "a ^ (2 ^ n) \<le> a ^ n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> a ^ n
by simp
lemma lemma_2_15_iii_1: "1 \<in> supremum {a, b} \<Longrightarrow> 1 \<in> supremum {a ^ (2 ^ n), b ^ (2 ^ n)}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a, b} \<Longrightarrow>
    (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ n, b ^ 2 ^ n}
apply (induct_tac n)
apply auto[1]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) \<in> supremum {a, b};
        (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ n, b ^ 2 ^ n}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (1::'a)
                         \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ Suc n, b ^ 2 ^ Suc n}
apply (drule drop_assumption)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ n, b ^ 2 ^ n}; True\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (1::'a)
                         \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ Suc n, b ^ 2 ^ Suc n}
apply (drule lemma_2_15_iii_0)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       \<lbrakk>True;
        (1::'a)
        \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (1::'a)
                         \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ Suc n, b ^ 2 ^ Suc n}
apply (subgoal_tac "\<forall>a . (a ^ (2::nat) ^ n)\<^sup>2 = a ^ (2::nat) ^ Suc n")
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n.
       \<lbrakk>True;
        (1::'a)
        \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>a. (a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2 = a ^ 2 ^ Suc n
apply safe

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n aa.
       \<lbrakk>True;
        (1::'a)
        \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2}\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2 = aa ^ 2 ^ Suc n
apply (cut_tac a = aa and m = "2 ^ n" and n = 2 in  power_mult)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n aa.
       \<lbrakk>True;
        (1::'a) \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2};
        aa ^ (2 ^ n * 2) = (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2 = aa ^ 2 ^ Suc n
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>n aa.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a)
                \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2};
        aa ^ (2 ^ n * 2) = (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2 = aa ^ (2 * 2 ^ n)
apply (subgoal_tac "((2::nat) ^ n * (2::nat)) = ((2::nat) * (2::nat) ^ n)")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>n aa.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a)
                \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2};
        aa ^ (2 ^ n * 2) = (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2;
        2 ^ n * 2 = 2 * 2 ^ n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2 = aa ^ (2 * 2 ^ n)
 2. \<And>n aa.
       \<lbrakk>(1::'a)
                \<in> supremum {(a ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2, (b ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2};
        aa ^ (2 ^ n * 2) = (aa ^ 2 ^ n)\<^sup>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> 2 ^ n * 2 = 2 * 2 ^ n
by simp_all

lemma lemma_2_15_iii:
    "1 \<in> supremum {a, b} \<Longrightarrow> 1 \<in> supremum {a ^ n, b ^ n}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a, b} \<Longrightarrow>
    (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ n, b ^ n}
apply (drule_tac n = n in lemma_2_15_iii_1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ 2 ^ n, b ^ 2 ^ n} \<Longrightarrow>
    (1::'a) \<in> supremum {a ^ n, b ^ n}
apply (simp add: supremum_def upper_bound_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<and> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<longrightarrow>
       (1::'a) \<le> x \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>x.
       a ^ n \<le> x \<and> b ^ n \<le> x \<longrightarrow> (1::'a) \<le> x
apply safe

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>x.
                   a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<and>
                   b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<longrightarrow>
                   (1::'a) \<le> x;
        a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (1::'a) \<le> x
apply (drule_tac x = x in spec)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<and> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x \<longrightarrow>
        (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (1::'a) \<le> x
apply safe

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x
apply (rule_tac y = "a ^ n" in order_trans)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> a ^ 2 ^ n \<le> a ^ n
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> a ^ n \<le> x
 3. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x
apply simp_all

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> x
apply (rule_tac y = "b ^ n" in order_trans)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b ^ 2 ^ n \<le> b ^ n
 2. \<And>x.
       \<lbrakk>a ^ n \<le> x; b ^ n \<le> x;
        \<not> (1::'a) \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b ^ n \<le> x
by simp_all
end
